TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PeerTransportCredentialType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the set of credential types used to authenticate a peer channel transport.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.PeerTransportCredentialType Certificate = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Authentication of the peer channel transport requires an X509 certificate.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.PeerTransportCredentialType Password = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Authentication of the peer channel transport requires a correct password.
